      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21454736">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454736">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454736">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454736">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21454736" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454737">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454737">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454737">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454737">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21454737" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21454738">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454738">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454738">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454738">
          <div id="boxatt21454738" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24951448">
              <a id="link_24951448" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951448,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An online collection of well-known reference books, available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454740">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454740">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454740">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454740">
          <div id="boxatt21454740" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24951450">
              <a id="link_24951450" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951450,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24951452">
              <a id="link_24951452" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951452,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963189">
              <a id="link_24963189" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=eric" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963189,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335240}); ">
               ERIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals, books, documents, and more in education and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963159">
              <a id="link_24963159" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963159,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24951451">
              <a id="link_24951451" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951451,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive (five year old and prior) of scholarly journals across the disciplines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24951454">
              <a id="link_24951454" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=phl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951454,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730094}); ">
               Philosopher's Index
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Standard journal database in philosophy.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963527">
              <a id="link_24963527" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963527,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454741">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454741">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454741">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical literature: newspapers and magazines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454741">
          <div id="boxatt21454741" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24951457">
              <a id="link_24951457" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951457,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963161">
              <a id="link_24963161" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=aph&amp;jid=CRN&amp;site=ehost-live" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963161,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24963161}); ">
               Chronicle of Higher Education
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available via Academic Search Complete.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963158">
              <a id="link_24963158" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963158,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454742">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454742">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454742">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary documents: press releases, interviews, college catalogs, speeches, etc.
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454742">
          <div id="boxatt21454742" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24951460">
              <a id="link_24951460" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951460,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454739">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454739">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454739">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454739">
          <div id="boxatt21454739" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24951449">
              <a id="link_24951449" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24951449,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cultivating Curiosity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5696810" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21454743">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454743">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454743">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454743">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's Online Writing Lab for a definition and examples of an
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            annotated bibliography
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21454743" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21454744">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21454744">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21454744">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21454744">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21454744" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
